name: Organic & Natural Skin Pamper Shower gel - Aloe Vera, Calendula and
description:
Immerse yourself in this nature's gift of Aloe vera, marigold and Almond oils. This mix gently cleanses the skin with its delicate and mild fragrance. The Aloe vera maintains the skin moisture while the marigold and almond oils keep your skin naturally soft and supple even with frequent showering.

Size: 500ml (Family size)

Uses

Can be used daily
